default.title: Limited launch
default.body: Secure your spot before we open the doors wider.

manager.title: Privacy choices
manager.description: We use essential cookies to run Louhen. Enable analytics if you want to help us improve the experience.

footer.trustHeadline: Podiatrist-led sizing with privacy built in
footer.trustBody: LouhenFit keeps family data in the EU and follows GDPR so every profile stays protected.

banner.title: We use cookies for analytics
banner.body: We’d like to measure how visitors use Louhen so we can improve the experience.

manage.title: Cookie preferences
manage.description: Enable analytics cookies to help us understand what’s working.

metrics.title: Metrics dashboard
metrics.intro: Key waitlist metrics updated every 60 seconds.
metrics.noTrend: No events recorded in this window.

body.acceptLanguage: Your browser language is set to {locale}.

trustCopy.fitGuarantee: Covered by LouhenFit — free returns, guaranteed.
trustCopy.fitDetail: LouhenFit protects every order — free returns until it fits.
trustCopy.fitCard: LouhenFit covers free returns on your first pair so we can fine-tune fit together.
trustCopy.gdpr: Your family’s data stays in the EU — GDPR compliant.
trustCopy.gdprDetail: We store every profile on EU servers and never sell or share customer data.
trustCopy.payment: Payments stay secure with Adyen’s bank-grade protection.

coverage.coveredNamed: {name} is covered by LouhenFit — free returns on the first pair to get the fit just right.
coverage.covered: This profile is covered by LouhenFit — free returns on the first pair to get the fit just right.
coverage.notCoveredNamed: {name} isn’t covered by LouhenFit yet. We’ll guide you with gentle fit tips until coverage expands.
coverage.notCovered: LouhenFit isn’t available for this profile yet. We’ll guide you with gentle fit tips until coverage expands.
